name: Registration Opens for Newest Live Well Career Prep Program
description: Registration is open for the next event in the Live Well San Diego Career Prep Series. The series is designed to guide and inspire San Diegans at every stage of their professional journey.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
Reading Time:  < 1 minuteRegistration is open for the next event in the Live Well San Diego Career Prep Series. The series is designed to guide and inspire San Diegans at every stage of their professional journey.  
You can register online for the Aug 20 virtual event featuring a range of dynamic industries, including non-profits Jewish Family Service, Latinas in Tech and MAAC, BioCom, Verizon Connect and a special appearance by the San Diego Padres.  
Looking ahead, the series has one more event planned. That in-person event will center on trade and vocational careers, highlighting professions that offer careers that don’t require a traditional four-year degree. 
The Career Prep Series was launched in February 2024 based on outreach and feedback from Live Well San Diego Youth Sector participants. Live Well San Diego includes four ‘sectors’ or collaborative groups of population-specific organizations that share resources and best practices.  
 

The series already hosted two previous panels, one focused on emergency services, the other on public health careers.
For more information and to register for upcoming panels, visit LiveWellSD.org.
